headline: Is American International Group (AIG) Pricing Reflect Its Insurance Risk And Capital Strength Story
summary: If you are wondering whether American International Group's current share price lines up with its underlying value, you are not alone. That is exactly what this article aims to unpack. The stock last closed at US$76.72, with returns of 2.5% over the past 7 days, a 0.5% decline over 30 days, a 9.0% decline year to date, and gains of 4.9% over 1 year, 33.8% over 3 years and 107.7% over 5 years. Recent news coverage around American International Group has focused on its role as a large global...

headline: Chubb Interest Puts AIG’s Transformation And Valuation In Sharper Focus
summary: Reports indicate Chubb is exploring a potential acquisition of American International Group, NYSE:AIG. The discussions reportedly center on combining two large global insurers into a single, larger group. No formal agreement has been announced, and key terms have not been disclosed. For AIG shareholders, the news comes with the stock recently closing at $76.72 and a value score of 4. Over the past 3 years, the share price return is 33.8%, and over 5 years it is 107.7%. These figures frame...
